full_text: Ukrainian-born Irish artist Sergey Talichkin has painted “Sunflowers” showing the beauty of #Ukraine in the face of invasion. All profits from the sale of prints will go to the @irishredcross. Please support if you can 🇮🇪🇺🇦: https://t.co/1jRxkBNc9x.

24 years ago, courageous people took a risk & found a way to make peace.  Since then, despite setbacks, Peace in Ireland, North & South, has been an example to the World.  Today #Ukraine reminds us of the value of peace. Never take it for granted! 🇮🇪🇬🇧 @dfatirl @irishmissionun https://t.co/XuldlOZJrb

@Alan__Shatter I and @dfatirl have been very clear in condemnation of recent terrorist attacks in Israel. Violence and terrorism is never justified. Our thoughts and condolences are with victims and their families. https://t.co/rYspqRkKzj

More horrific images, more deliberate targeting of civilians by #Russian military in #Ukraine, this time predominantly women & children trying to flee conflict areas by train!  Sanctions must be as strong as possible to stop this kind of savagery.  #StandWithUkraine https://t.co/OPJay9Bfzu
Great progress for the South East! Well done to all involved at @waterfordit and @itcarlow. @SimonHarrisTD https://t.co/sb2ZKUbbXJ
Five Irish MEPs sign motion calling for all EU ports to close to Russian vessels ⁦@FineGael⁩  https://t.co/SZD1eSHSlH
Welcome Home. Thank you for you ongoing service and professionalism @defenceforces https://t.co/5uLsvUkYR2

Such a privilege today, as Minister for Defence, to present members of 97th Cadet Class and 11th Potential Officers Course with their commission.   Significant day in careers of future leaders of our @defenceforces.  We look to the future with confidence. @IRLDeptDefence 🇮🇪🇪🇺🇺🇳 https://t.co/y6NoZN9TGY
#StandWithUkraine @EU_Commission https://t.co/PzbCBji3IH

Spoke with @DmytroKuleba again this evening & heard descriptions of shocking crimes in Bucha.  Has history taught us nothing! - we are witnessing mass murder against civilians at the heart of Europe by Russian forces.  #EU must respond strongly with tougher sanctions this week. https://t.co/T9rxVWYbCQ

Shocking scenes of atrocities  in #Ukraine by Russian forces must be fully documented & pursued by an International Court. There can be no impunity for crimes like these.  International Community has a duty to demand accountability. @CIJ_ICJ @IntlCrimCourt @UN_HRC @DmytroKuleba https://t.co/hmvyDUyKkT
Thank you and well done @CofIrelandCork - leadership and generosity. #StandWithUkraine https://t.co/A164UOt0ja
Congratulations @TomClonan on your election to Seanad Eireann - looking forward to working with you! @dfatirl @IRLDeptDefence
@JoaoCravinho Congratulations @JoaoCravinho - looking forward to working with you.

#Ireland strongly condemns terrorist attacks in #Israel in recent days. Terrorism and violence is never justified and must stop. Our thoughts and condolences are with the victims and their loved ones. @dfatirl @irishmissionun
Thank you to our #SecurityCouncil partners for this moment of respect and recognition for the late Ambassador Jim Kelly. #Ireland @irishmissionun @UN https://t.co/WkTE8mGC7q
Statement just released ⁦@dfatirl⁩ https://t.co/4nVvwT97CV

Good conversation with @DmytroKuleba this morning. He updated me on the current situation and the new round of Peace talks in Turkey. He thanked #Ireland for our ongoing strong support on all levels.  #StandWithUkraine
Great humanitarian work by @IrishAirCorps https://t.co/ZZuusrG4MD
We #StandWithUkriane @DmytroKuleba https://t.co/Rlzox7myyn

In Belfast with @Humefoundation to honour John & Pat’s legacy of peace for all communities. Saddened  & frustrated that someone has been attacked & victimised in this way and my thoughts are with him & his family. My thanks to ⁦@PoliceServiceNI⁩  https://t.co/bs9LvTKBHW
Great news for #Cork and a further reminder of the talent we have to attract this scale of international investment. @IDAIRELAND https://t.co/q0APe9f0mn

Thanks to @ClarenceHouse for a really positive visit yesterday. Always welcome in #Ireland. Thank you for your friendship and work to strengthen and deepen UK/Ireland relations. 🇮🇪🇬🇧 https://t.co/TgT2bm8yT2

It’s a privilege to welcome their Royal Highnesses again today. They continue to work for a strengthening & deepening of U.K./Irish relations & are valued friends of #Ireland.  Looking forward to visiting a family dairy farm together in #Waterford focused on sustainability 🇮🇪🇬🇧 https://t.co/jJXCwt36GU
@JohnOBrennan2 @BeattieDoug @BeattieDoug is always welcome in #Cork

Privileged to celebrate the Centenary of Irish Military Aviation with @IrishAirCorps today. Thank you to all our dedicated @defenceforces personnel who continue to serve #Ireland at home and abroad with distinction. 🇮🇪 @IRLDeptDefence https://t.co/qiE16edrWL

This decision is regrettable & contrary to the approach that U.K. and Irish Governments have supported for many years to protect free movement on the Island of Ireland for everyone.  Our concern on this has been communicated clearly but has been ignored.  https://t.co/7OqH9ebwzX
@MedgibbonsCathy @IrishAirCorps @defenceforces @IRLDeptDefence @NASCriticalCare @transport_neo Your absolutely right. Thank you @NASCriticalCare @transport_neo

Very significant achievement today: #EU Foreign & Defence Ministers approve the #StrategicCompass, reinforcing EU ability to undertake crisis management missions, improving #cyber and #hybrid resilience &  strengthening relationships with international orgs, including the @UN https://t.co/qMWzNGmCJx
Thank you @IrishAirCorps - important work. #StandWithUkraine @defenceforces @IRLDeptDefence https://t.co/7dI0DGOLsG

It was a privilege to attend our National Day of Remembrance and Reflection Event. We remember everyone lost to Covid-19 and their families who continue to carry the burden of loss. We acknowledge the heroic work and sacrifice of so many on the front line to keep us safe. https://t.co/JBhi0zTlk2
@rodgerphhill My sincere and deepest sympathies on your loss. So unexpected and devastating for your family. You are in our thoughts and prayers.
This is so sad. My sincere condolences go out to David Hill’s family and many friends and colleagues who must be heartbroken. https://t.co/0aJRstaEAE
We could learn a lot from our children…. https://t.co/83VbbGBnZg

The people of Poland have shown amazing humanity in welcoming 2 million people from #Ukraine. Last night I was proud to hear from Ambassador @IRLeoconnell & the Irish community in Warsaw about all their efforts including opening up their homes. 🇮🇪 🇵🇱 🇺🇦 🇪🇺 ⁦@dfatirl⁩ https://t.co/yMzEUdo0ro

Very constructive discussion with FM @RauZbigniew yesterday in #Poland on #Russia’s invasion of #Ukraine and how #Ireland can support the extraordinary polish efforts to support Ukrainian refugees fleeing war. @dfatirl https://t.co/lCYDZx5aaY
Rachael Blackmore is everything that’s good about competitive sport! What an outstanding role model. Congratulations on another epic win!   https://t.co/PCS8q5bM1Q
City centre hubs set up to help Ukrainians fleeing war.  https://t.co/J35bYyET2Z

I’m in #Poland to meet my counterpart to hear what more #Ireland and EU can do to help refugees. Already I have seen the extraordinary lengths Poland has gone to in receiving more than 2 million people in 3 weeks from Ukraine. Incredible solidarity here. 🇮🇪 🇵🇱 🇺🇦 🇪🇺 https://t.co/Xkt9WDXn8C
Fantastic hospitality in Washington as ever from @POTUS on this #StPatricksDay  🇺🇸🇮🇪 bonds and friendship remains stronger than ever! @MichealMartinTD @dfatirl https://t.co/6O5dqpmXUu
On this #StPatricksDay Irish people all around the world Stand in Solidarity with #Ukraine and her people. “Ar scáth a chéile a mhaireann na daoine” 🇺🇦🇮🇪🇪🇺🇺🇳 #StandWithUkriane https://t.co/YNcJLalMD6
#Ireland will continue to do all we can to #StandWithUkriane https://t.co/5PJhrWkzNx
4th Sanctions Package now agreed. #StandWithUkraine https://t.co/PGMrp61t6L
Love this….!! 🇮🇪 https://t.co/PrNLj5z7PR
Pleased to announce today the purchase of two inshore patrol vessels for the Naval Service fleet. ⁦@defenceforces⁩ ⁦@IRLDeptDefence⁩  https://t.co/mbs0OtAG66

Taoiseach is clear and correct - priority for #Ireland is the humanitarian obligation we have to provide for those fleeing war, with speed, and without complicated checks or screening. #StandWithUkraine https://t.co/7W5LvluIIp
@ElainaFitzKane @IHFcomms Thank u. 🇮🇪🇺🇦

Shocking images of unspeakable acts of cruelty by Russian forces in Mariupol.  My God…. Targeting a children’s hospital in a city where a cease fire was promised for humanitarian relief.  The world must demand accountability for this kind of brutality.  @irishmissionun https://t.co/iaJ1236nQg

Spoke to Joint Committee on Foreign Affairs & Defence this evening about priorities for defence spending.  I’m currently working on a memo for Govt consideration to respond to ⁦@IRLCoDF⁩ recommendations for increased resources and reform. ⁦@IRLDeptDefence⁩ ⁦ https://t.co/hyp0wZvMXC
Welcome to Dublin. Looking forward to meeting later. #Ireland #Scotland relations have never been stronger. 🇮🇪 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 https://t.co/6iWSrDgoQM

Good series of meetings at @UN today. Spoke at #UNSC on Women, Peace & Security on #IWD2022 and condemned #Russia for war in #Ukraine. Later spoke to @antonioguterres on Irish support for UN leadership on ending the War in Ukraine. https://t.co/4whVCa3Xjl
You can now register pledges of accommodation and other services to assist Ukrainian refugees with the Irish Red Cross. #StandWithUkraine️ Please RT.  Link here; https://t.co/nD4etlGxKF
Congratulations @johncreedon - very worthy winner of Cork Person of the Year. #Cork https://t.co/X3Vur2s1HT
Well done @cllrmmurphytipp #StandWithUkraine️ https://t.co/LDiMXHJMnC

Important meeting of friends and partners today in Brussels from across the EuroAtlantic to reinforce our determination to protect Int law, democracy, EU values and to #StandWithUkraine  @DmytroKuleba https://t.co/tp4jNMI4Lp
@PresidentIRL Wishing the President and Mrs Higgins a speedy recovery.

Russia’s attack on the #Zaporizhzhia nuclear power station is utterly reckless. Russia’s military activity in the area must cease immediately. This is a grave threat to the European continent. Our full support to the @iaea and DG @rafaelmgrossi in their essential work. @dfatirl https://t.co/BPaYnJwBOu
Congratulations to our team! @IRLDeptDefence @defenceforces https://t.co/kBK5eKx2Pr

Shocking destruction, war crimes, targeting of civilian areas by Russia’s war machine in the heart of Europe.  Emergency FA Council tomorrow in Brussels to agree 4th round of tougher sanctions. These horrors bring EU together in a way that I’ve never seen! #StandWithUkraine️ https://t.co/E18YdDiabA

EU justice ministers unanimously agreed today to activate the EU Temporary Protection Directive for the first time.  It facilitates all refugees fleeing Ukraine to come to all 27 member states and be fully protected and supported. 🇮🇪🇺🇦🇪🇺#StandWithUkraine

On the way to Cabinet sub-committee on #Ukraine & Ireland’s ongoing response to the unfolding horror of Putin’s invasion and brutality. Ahead of the meeting I met Ambassador @GeraskoLarysa & once again pledged the full support & solidarity of Ireland.🇺🇦🇮🇪 https://t.co/p3mAly8blP

Ireland is also leading efforts today at #UN Security Council to secure a resolution calling for safe humanitarian access, protection of civilians, calling out violations of international humanitarian and human rights law and demanding an immediate ceasefire. #StandWithUkraine

94 UN Member States co-sponsoring this UN General Assembly resolution today, condemning Russian aggression against Ukraine, demanding an immediate ceasefire & unconditional withdrawal. Every #UN MS should vote in favour https://t.co/Mjamun0WSQ
